name: ywlab-integrated
description: YWLab Frontend + Backend 통합 개발 서버

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo '설치 완료! npm run dev로 서버를 시작하세요.'
scripts.check:venv: python -c "import sys; print('가상환경:', '활성화됨' if hasattr(sys, 'real_prefix') or (hasattr(sys, 'base_prefix') and sys.base_prefix != sys.prefix) else '비활성화됨')"

author: YWLab Team
